name: gridsafe-monitoring
description: IoT-based Low Voltage AC Distribution Over Head conductor monitoring system for KSEBL

scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.setup:backend: cd fullstack/backend && npm install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run prisma:migrate && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.db:reset: cd fullstack/backend && npm run prisma:migrate:reset && npm run prisma:seed

author: KSEBL Development Team
